mapper.select: select r.uuid,v.name vipName,r.shareMoney,r.ygxfDate,md.shopName,md.logo shopLogo from share_history_record r,capital_flow_record c,share_vip v,`user` md where r.vipId=v.id and v.shopId=md.id and r.fxzOpenId=#{fxzOpenId} and c.srUuid=r.uuid and c.state=${@com.cqgVipShare.entity.CapitalFlowRecord@YXF_STATE} order by ygxfDate
